channel.title: Noobiest question!
channel.description:
how do i work a script?? like i always try it and nothing happens.. no errors..
could someone give me a bot or like a good mouse recorder for wilows?

item.title: Noobiest question!
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

There are MANY tutorials on how to. You need to donwload scar, get srl and the includes, get a script, fill in the information as it says, drag the cross hair onto the runescpe client, and click play. And btw, autoclickers will get you banned without hours guarenteed because of how detectabel they are (trust me, my rl firend did lol). If this doesnt help, please post more information.

Read full topic
